selected_metadata.overview: いじめの末に無惨な姿となった少女の霊。彼女は雨の日に子供を引きずり回して肉塊に変える。アスファルトに爪が立てられる音が近づいてくる。
selected_metadata.horror_point: 『何かが引きずられる音』というASMR的な聴覚の恐怖と、長身でボロボロの衣服を纏ったビジュアルのインパクトが強烈。

data.title_en: NEVER WALK ALONE IN THE RAIN... Hikiko-san Is Coming
data.title_jp: 雨の日は後ろを見るな…日本で最も恐ろしい『ひきこさん』の呪い
data.description:
Have you ever heard a scratching sound behind you on a rainy day? This is the tragic and gruesome story of Hikiko-san, Japan's most terrifying urban legend. A girl bullied until she became a vengeful spirit, she now drags her victims across the cold asphalt until they are unrecognizable. 

In this video, we dive into the chilling details of The Dragging Girl. Why does she target children? The atmospheric horror of Japanese urban legends comes to life in this short. Stay tuned to understand the psychological dread of J-horror. Do you think you could survive her grasp? Tell us in the comments if you've heard this legend before. Japanese Horror, Urban Legend, Creepy, Supernatural, Hikiko-san story.

data.editorial_notes:
【エキスパート協議結果】
1. Viral Architect: タイトル案として以下3案を提示。
   A: NEVER WALK ALONE IN THE RAIN... Hikiko-san Is Coming
   B: SHOCKING: The Girl Who Drags Children to Hell
   C: 100% CREEPY: Japan's Most Terrifying Urban Legend #Shorts
   選定理由: Aを採用。視聴者に「雨の日」という具体的なシチュエーションで恐怖を自分事化させ、クリックを促す警告型のフックが最も強力だと判断。
2. The Whisperer: 「引きずる音」という聴覚的恐怖を「金属的な爪の音」として強調。絶望的なビジュアル（長身、ボロボロの白衣）を短いフレーズで畳み掛ける構成にしました。
3. The Visionary: 雨の質感を「Grainy」で表現し、35mmレンズの設定で実写のような生々しさを演出。ひきこさんの異常な長身を強調する構図を各プロンプトに組み込みました。
演出指示: Vrewでの読み上げは、雨の音のSEに合わせて少し間を空け、後半に向けてスピードを上げることで焦燥感を煽ってください。
data.vrew_script:
Listen closely to the rhythm of the rain
Something is scraping against the wet asphalt
A sound like metal claws on cold stone
Do you see her in the grey mist
She stands seven feet tall in tattered white
Her hair is a tangled web of shadows
Behind her she drags a heavy burden
Once it was a child now it is flesh
She was bullied until she became a monster
Now she hunts those who are alone
Don't look back even if you hear her
Because Hikiko-san is right behind you
